name: Soul Pals
description:
Soul Pals is a single-player puzzle platformer in which you play as two soul-bound pals that need to work together to escape their dark and soundless dungeon. The two are cursed to share a soul tether and can only handle moving one at a time, lest they burn out their souls. After a set interval of time, the soul gets overloaded from one body and shot along the tether to the opposite side. If either body gets hit by this fatal shot, both pals die.

Controls: 
A / D  -  Move Left / Right
Space - Jump

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 to the theme of Joined Together.

Programmer: Daniel MacCormick
Artist: Alain Sangalang
